abstract: United States defeats Guatemala, 4-0, in exhibition soccer match in advance of Concacaf Gold Cup.
lead_paragraph: Clint Dempsey, Timmy Chandler and Chris Wondolowski scored and Guatemala provided an own goal in a 4-0 victory in Nashville.

headline.main: United States Routs Guatemala in Warm-Up for Gold Cup
headline.print_headline: U.S. Routs Guatemala in Gold Cup Warm-Up

snippet: Clint Dempsey, Timmy Chandler and Chris Wondolowski scored and Guatemala provided an own goal in a 4-0 victory in Nashville.
